binary.left: hass_climate_current_temperature_celsius{domain="climate", entity="climate.main_floor_thermostat", friendly_name="Main Floor Thermostat", instance="home-assistant.home.svc.cluster.local:8123", job="hass", prometheus="monitoring/victoria-metrics"}

hass_climate_current_temperature_celsius{domain="climate", entity="climate.main_floor_thermostat", friendly_name="Main Floor Thermostat", instance="home-assistant.home.svc.cluster.local:8123", job="hass", prometheus="monitoring/victoria-metrics"} * 1.8

targets.expr: avg by (friendly_name) (hass_binary_sensor_state{friendly_name=~"Main Floor Thermostat Occupancy|Master Bedroom Sensor Occupancy"})

(hass_sensor_temperature_celsius{friendly_name=~"Back Patio Hose Bib Crawl Space Climate Probe Temperature|Broadlink Hub Temperature|Dog Run Hose Bib Crawl Space Probe Temperature|Garage Motion Sensor Temperature|Laundry Room Motion Temperature|Main Floor Thermostat Temperature|Master Bedroom Closet Motion Temperature|Master Bedroom Sensor Temperature|Office Closet In-Wall Climate Probe Temperature|Office Side Crawl Space Climate Probe Temperature"}) * 1.8 + 32

hass_sensor_humidity_percent{friendly_name=~"Back Patio Hose Bib Crawl Space Climate Probe Humidity|Broadlink Hub Humidity|Dog Run Hose Bib Crawl Space Probe Humidity|Main Floor Thermostat Humidity|Office Closet In-Wall Climate Probe Humidity|Office Side Crawl Space Climate Probe Humidity|",job="hass"}
